br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.scripts
Class CardAction

java.lang.Object
  br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.scripts.CardAction
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultAction, EletricCurrent1Action, HackingAction, MineralogyAction, RecoveryAction
public abstract class CardAction
extends java.lang.Object

Class for implementing the actions/effects for each card. A CardAction object can only exist in the local memory, unable to go under serialization.
